details.title: Reply to &#8220;On Some Recent Modifications of Weibull Distribution&#8221;

references.title: Bathtub-shaped failure rate life distributions
references.text: N. Balakrishnan, C. R. Rao, "Bathtub-shaped failure rate life distributions" in Handbook of Statistics [on Reliability], pp. 69-106, 2001, North Holland.

references.title: Weibull-related distributions for the modeling of bathtub shaped failure rate functions
references.text: K. Doksum, B. Lindquist, "Weibull-related distributions for the modeling of bathtub shaped failure rate functions" in Mathematical and Statistical Methods in Reliability, pp. 283-298, 2003, World Scientific Pub.

references.title: A new statistical distribution for characterizing the random strength of brittle materials

context.text: [3] where the motivation was in the context of modeling the strength of material.
[3] as the first to propose the model, and like to state that we came up with the model independently.

references.text: M. R. Gurvich, A. T. Dibenedetto, S. V. Rande, "A new statistical distribution for characterizing the random strength of brittle materials", Journal of Materials Science, vol. 32, pp. 2559-2564, 1997.

ieee.title: A Lifetime Distribution With an Upside-Down Bathtub-Shaped Hazard Function
ieee.displayText: Theodora Dimitrakopoulou, Konstantinos Adamidis, Sotirios Loukas, "A Lifetime Distribution With an Upside-Down Bathtub-Shaped Hazard Function", Reliability IEEE Transactions on, vol. 56, pp. 308-311, 2007, ISSN 0018-9529.
